headline: Cummins Promotes Five Experienced Leaders to Vice President
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / April 4, 2025 /Cummins Inc. is pleased to announce the promotion of five exceptional leaders to the position of Vice President, effective March 1, 2025. These leaders bring diverse experience, backgrounds and skillsets ...
